title: What questions can’t my 7th grade math teacher answer? - Quora

response.answer_text: What questions can’t my 7th grade math teacher answer? It really depends on your individual teacher. Here is what I would hope your 7th grade math teacher CAN answer: Why is a negative value plus a negative value a negative value, but a negative value times a negative value a negative value?Why does “invert and multiply” work? That is, why does (5/6)÷(1/3) = (5/6)•(3/1)?Why is the formula for the area of a triangle: A = (1/2) x base x altitude. [A =(1/2)ba]
